CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Horizon Enterprises relative to NovaTech Solutions?
SRP.A: Horizon Enterprises is {above} NovaTech Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aegis Corp relative to Horizon Enterprises?
SRP.A: Aegis Corp is {below} Horizon Enterprises in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaTech Solutions relative to Aegis Corp?
SRP.A: NovaTech Solutions is {above} Aegis Corp in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer acquisition cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {NovaTech Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer acquisition cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Vanguard Dynamics}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is NovaTech Solutions's minimum Customer Acquisition Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: NovaTech Solutions's minimum Customer Acquisition Cost is in {1962}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Vanguard Dynamics's minimum Customer Acquisition Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Vanguard Dynamics's minimum Customer Acquisition Cost is in {1979}.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Acquisition Cost in 1957 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total customer acquisition cost in 1957 was {lower} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1979, did the total Customer Acquisition Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1977?
NC.A: The change in total customer acquisition cost between 1962 and 1979 was {larger} than between 1974 and 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1966, did the total Customer Acquisition Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total customer acquisition cost between 1957 and 1966 was {smaller} than between 1967 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1970, was the average total Customer Acquisition Cost higher or lower than between 1970 and 1971?
NC.A: The average total customer acquisition cost between 1963 and 1970 was {lower} than between 1970 and 1971.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {NovaTech Solutions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Horizon Enterprises and NovaTech Solutions first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Horizon Enterprises and NovaTech Solutions did not exchange leading positions.
